name: The Shifting Catacombs of Mu'ralagh
description:
Explore shifting catacombs! Solve some kind of puzzle! Marvel at the abrupt ending!

Created for the Ludum Dare Compo 38: A Small World.

If anything goes horribly wrong, please let me know!

Rate it at ldjam.com! https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/38/$18578

Controls

Arrow keys to move

Space to jump

Changelog

0.1.2 - May 10 2017

  • Updated game metadata (added an app icon, updated the game name, etc.)
  • Support for multiple resolutions! There's still some resolutions the pixel-perfect will crap out on, but it should work for most standard resolutions. Please let me know if none of the resolutions work for you.
  • Added a space to jump prompt to the game

0.1.1 - April 24 2017

  • Fixed softlock bug

0.1.0 - April 23 2017

  • Released!
Credits

JukeDeck for the procedural music. Create your own tracks at http://jukedeck.com!

Most SFX made using cfxr.

Source (Unity)

https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B7YBVqA7MAbcckJBZ...
